He was born in Rogers, Texas. == Awards received == * John Simon Guggenheim Memorial Foundation Fellowship * Spingarn Medal (1976) * Kennedy Center Honors (1988) * Presidential Medal of Freedom * Capezio Dance Award (1997) Category:American choreographers Category:LGBT African-Americans Category:1931 births Category:1989 deaths Category:LGBT people from Texas
